# Character Guide

This guide lists recurring characters and ensemble labels used across the full script.

## Main Characters

- 遙遙 — jiu4 jiu4 — Yiu-Yiu — Energetic student lead who grows from dependence on “ding” magic toward self-reliance.
- 安娜 — on1 no4 — Anna — Practical classmate and frequent grounding voice in group decisions.
- 花輪達爾（達爾） — faa1 leon4 daat6 ji5 (daat6 ji5) — Dar — Flashy, emotional student who gradually learns patience and practical skills.
- 比比 — bei2 bei2 — Bibi — Proud rival figure whose arc moves toward accountability, cooperation, and reconciliation.
- 露露 — lou6 lou6 — Lulu — Bibi’s close companion and frequent scene partner.
- 菲菲 — fei1 fei1 — Fei-Fei — Student companion in family-rival and camp sequences.
- 小志 — siu2 zi3 — Siu-Chi — Highly capable peer who models practical life skills and teamwork.

## Faculty and Hosts

- 喬治（總管） — giu1 zi6 (zung2 gun2) — George (Head Butler) — Lead butler authority and frequent announcer/moderator.
- 柔柔（老師） — jau4 jau4 (lou5 si1) — Miss Yau-Yau — Teacher guiding students through adaptation and responsibility.
- 芳花（老師） — fong1 faa1 (lou5 si1) — Miss Fong-Fa — Teacher/emcee in quiz and competition segments.

## Butlers and Support Roles

- 貝琪 — bui3 kei4 — Becky — Butler support role in daily-routine and camp scenes.
- 哈娜 — haa1 no4 — Hana — Butler support role in academy and camp sequences.
- 占士 — zim1 si6 — James — Butler/support role across multiple scenes.
- 艾莉 — ngaai6 lei6 — Ellie — Butler role closely tied to student daily-life routines.
- 芬尼（麥芬尼） — fan1 nei4 (mak6 fan1 nei4) — Fanny — Butler label appearing in two OCR variants, treated as one character.
- 奧妙妮 — ou3 miu6 nei4 — O-Miu-Nei — Butler/attendant role in service and announcement dialogue.
- 魯魯夫 — lou5 lou5 fu1 — Lulu-Fu — Butler role in breakfast and support sequences.
- 沙沙拉 — saa1 saa1 laai1 — Sa-Sa-La — Butler role in training/meeting segments.

## Ensemble Labels

- 管家合唱 — gun2 gaa1 hap6 coeng3 — Butler Chorus — Ensemble singer label used in butler anthem passages.
